DOC.brief_title: Comparison Lokomat Aquatic Exercise Individuals With Chronic Incomplete Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: This research occur two center Kernan Orthopedics Rehabilitation Hospital Baltimore , Maryland Shepherd Center Atlanta , Georgia . A total 36 volunteer three year period need . In order qualify study , individual must 18 65 year old motor incomplete SCI . The level injury range fourth cervical level neck twelfth thoracic level back . Potential volunteer must able tolerate stand stand frame least 30 minute . Individuals assess physician determine eligibility study participate type exercise would safe . Participants must able understand study requirement sign inform consent document . Participants need commit total seven month . Included time : testing , 3 month exercise , test , 2 week break , second 3 month exercise , final testing . Half group start Lokomat training half start wtih aquatic exercise . Each group switch exercise condition . Exercise session occur three time per week last approximately 45-55 minute . A physical therapist provide personal direction exercise group . Walking ability cardiovascular fitness , well muscle strength assess start exercise , three-month point six month point . It hop type exercise therapy help individual motor incomplete spinal injury walk good experience well heart-lung fitness endurance . The risk associate type study similar type cardiovascular exercise . In addition , individual spinal cord injury may present medical condition , may risk study . The physicians therapist involve research discus risk detail individual enroll . This type research important good understand best prescribe exercise treatment people spinal injury . This especially true regard aquatic therapy , since little scientific data effect group individual . The rigorous assessment aquatic exercise , already available many community , may expand fitness opportunity individual incomplete spinal cord injury .
